name: io.github.summerdawn-ai/mcpifier
title: Mcpifier
description: Mcpifier is a zero-code MCP gateway that exposes an existing REST API as an MCP server.

packageArguments.name: --mode
packageArguments.description: Run Mcpifier server in stdio mode

packageArguments.name: --swagger
packageArguments.description: Path or URL of the Swagger/OpenAPI specification JSON file from which to generate tool mappings

environmentVariables.name: MCPIFIER__REST__FORWARDEDHEADERS__AUTHORIZATION
environmentVariables.description: Turn off forwarded headers in stdio mode

environmentVariables.name: DOTNET_CONTENTROOT
environmentVariables.description: Optional directory containing appsettings.json or mappings.json to load automatically
